content:
The No. tennessee Lady Vols cross country team finished third at the 8K SEC Championships in Baton Rouge La PERIOD

The finish snapped a three year streak of SEC titles PERIOD The Lady Vols finished with  points two points behind second place Georgia and  points behind winner Arkansas PERIOD

The Lady Vols were led by sophomore Sarah Bowman and senior Katie Flaute PERIOD Bowman finished in seventh . and Flaute finished twelfth .8m as both received AllSEC honors for their performance PERIOD

We have had more positive things than negative things happen for us this year but today we were beaten by a better team coach J.J PERIOD Clark said PERIOD Katie has been a highlight this season and a staple of this cross country team no question about it. freshman Jackie Areson finished fifteenth with a career best time of . pERIOD Areson has scored points in all five races she competed in PERIOD Sophomores Katie Van Horn and Leah Soro captured the four and five positions PERIOD Van Horn had a career best time in sixteenth place with . while Soro placed twentieth with a time of . in only her second race of the season PERIOD

I am focusing more on the positives Clark said PERIOD I was very happy for Katie Van Horn PERIOD She ran tough as did Leah and Jackie PERIOD Of the people scoring for us we had Flaute then three sophomores and a freshman. the Lady Vols turn their attention to preparing for the NCAA South Regionals which they will host on Nov PERIOD  PERIOD

We have to get ready and regroup because if we dont we are going to be staying home from the NCAA meet Clark said PERIOD We are going to go home reboot get it together and make sure that everyone performs at her best in two weeks. they will be trying to win their fifth straight regional championship PERIOD

Mens Cross Country

The Mens cross country team finished fourth in the 8K race with  points PERIOD Arkansas won the team title with  points followed by Florida in second with  points and Alabama in third with  points PERIOD

Captain Tyler DeVault led the Vols with his 12thplace . finish PERIOD Senior Jeff Day finished second and sixteenth overall with his time of . pERIOD Junior Matt Piccarello was third placing twenty-eighth in . pERIOD The forth and fifth place runners for the Vols was held by seniors Nate Jansen who finished thirty-third with a time of . and Chris Platt in . for thirty-sixth place PERIOD

The men now begin gearing up for the South Regionals on Nov PERIOD  at Lambert Acres Golf Club in Maryville Tenn PERIOD The last time Tennessee hosted the South Regional was in  PERIOD The top two teams at the regional meet automatically advance to the NCAA Championship meet in Terre Haute Ind PERIOD The Vols need to have a good showing in the regional to secure a bid to NCAA tournament PERIOD
